articles.description: Mbappe's future is going to be the story of the summer. He had two options: activate his extra option year or renegotiate a new deal with a ton of leverage. Wouldn't you do the same thing? After all, NBA stars have been doing it for years.
articles.content: On Tuesday, PSG's Kylian Mbappe confirmed to the AFP that he won't be activating the third-year option on his current contract. Essentially, he'll be a free agent next summer ... just like he was las… [+12074 chars]

articles.title: Grizzlies' Ja Morant suspended for 25 games by NBA - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: The NBA has suspended Grizzlies star Ja Morant for 25 games to start the 2023-24 season due to his 'reckless and irresponsible behavior with guns.'
articles.content:
The NBA has suspended Memphis Grizzlies star Ja Morant for 25 games to start the 2023-24 season because of conduct detrimental to the league, it was announced Friday.
